Name: Complete Purchase of New iPhone 15 with Checkout Process
Description: Navigate to the Apple category, select the iPhone 15, configure options, and complete the checkout process. Verify the thank you page after order completion.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/*'
Step 3: Click on button HotNewiPhone15
Step 4: Click on label storageColorOptions (512GB)
Step 5: Click on label storageColorOptions (Green)
Step 6: Click on button Buy
Step 7: Click on span Link3 -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 8: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
Step 9: Click on input Email
Step 10: Enter input value in input Email
Step 11: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/shipping-address'
Step 12: Click on input FirstName
Step 13: Enter input value in input FirstName
Step 14: Click on input LastName
Step 15: Enter input value in input LastName
Step 16: Click on input Address
Step 17: Enter input value in input Address
Step 18: Click on input ZipCode
Step 19: Enter input value in input ZipCode
Step 20: Click on input City
Step 21: Enter input value in input City
Step 22: Click on input State
Step 23: Enter input value in input State
Step 24: Click on input Phone
Step 25: Enter input value in input Phone
Step 26: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/payment'
Step 27: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank you page#thank-you/*'
Step 28: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Add to Cart and Checkout Process for Apple Products
Description: Navigate to the Apple category, add an item to the cart, configure options, and proceed to checkout. Complete the process and verify return to the home page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/*'
Step 3: Click on button AddToCart
Step 4: Click on label storageColorOptions (256GB)
Step 5: Click on label storageColorOptions (Green)
Step 6: Click on label storageColorOptions (1TB)
Step 7: Click on button Buy
Step 8: Click on link GoToCart
Step 9: Click on link GoToCart -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 10: Click on button ProceedToCheckout2 -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
Step 11: Click on input Email
Step 12: Enter input value in input Email
Step 13: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/shipping-address'
Step 14: Click on input FirstName
Step 15: Enter input value in input FirstName
Step 16: Click on input LastName
Step 17: Enter input value in input LastName
Step 18: Click on input Address
Step 19: Enter input value in input Address
Step 20: Click on input ZipCode
Step 21: Enter input value in input ZipCode
Step 22: Click on input City
Step 23: Enter input value in input City
Step 24: Click on input State
Step 25: Enter input value in input State
Step 26: Click on input Phone
Step 27: Enter input value in input Phone
Step 28: Click on body CheckoutBack -> Navigate to page ''
Step 29: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
